lines.text: I'm practically on a Wheaties box.
I don't think anybody wants to look at your face while they're eating.

[Laura sees the black car]
Stephanie! Get in the house right now!
I thought you wanted the mail!
That's funny. She was right behind me.
Well, maybe her mother picked her up.
She was right behind me when we came out of the school. If her mom was going to pick her up she would have said something.
I guess her mom picked her up alright.
I saw her get into her car.

[Laura and Stephanie exit the bus]
Kim! Kimberly!
Did she say anything? Anything at all about her mom picking her up today?
She would have said something to me! Mom, what is it? What happened to her? Mom!
